text: The Mets suck. As a lifelong Mets fan I know this. I love the Mets. Itâ€™s a family thing. Parents and grandparents loved the Brooklyn Dodgers so I love the Mets. As usual  some <s>fucking</s> Yankees fans got Mets hats and are pretending to be Mets  fans.
